format: html

```{r}
library(ramp.xds)
library(ramp.library)
```

```{r, echo=F}
if(!file.exists("model_list.rds")){
  default <- list(name = "default", owner = "noone")
  model_list <- list() 
  model_list$default <- default 
  default <- xds_setup()
  default$model_name <- "default"
  saveRDS(model_list, "model_list.rds")
  saveRDS(default, "default.rds")
} 

readRDS("model_list.rds")
```
